Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
ModifyConfig SOAP Command

Modify Configuration attributes
Note: an empty attribute value removes the specified attr

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

ModifyConfigRequest

    <ModifyConfigRequest> ## ModifyConfigRequest
        (<a n="{key}" /> ## Attr)*
    </ModifyConfigRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <ModifyConfigRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/a Optional (0 or more) Attributes
/a@n Required (only 1) Type:String
Key
